lore: The Nixes are an intelligent species that lives in underground cities. At present, they are not at war with any other.\n\nSome Nixes are known to leave no trace after a murder. In the surface lands they are called Nix Creepers. They can sneak into well-protected mansions, bypassing any security in the gardens and corridors without being discovered. The next morning, everything will remain intact except for their target, which will have become a corpse.
menagerieDialog: Leave me alone. I must rest before we venture forth into a new Realm.
You should strive to be more efficient. There's no need to stop back at your castle between every single realm.
I hear you've got a problem that needs solved.
My blade is ready. Let's assassinate some kings.
This castle is so loud and overwhelming. I can't wait to get out of here.
name: Nix Creeper
